00018 #include <vector>
00019 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00020 #include "xyzreader.h"
00021 
00022 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00023     using namespace boost;
00024 using namespace std;
00025 
00026 bool XYZReader::ReadTopology(string file,  Topology &top)
00027 {
00028    _topology = true;
00029    top.Cleanup();
00030 
00031    _fl.open(file.c_str());
00032     if(!_fl.is_open())
00033         throw std::ios_base::failure("Error on open topologyl file: " + file);
00034 
00035    if(_topology)
00036         top.CreateResidue("DUM");
00037 
00038    NextFrame(top);
00039 
00040     _fl.close();
00041 
00042     return true;
00043 }
00044 
00045 bool XYZReader::Open(const string &file)
00046 {
00047     _fl.open(file.c_str());
00048     if(!_fl.is_open())
00049         throw std::ios_base::failure("Error on open topologyl file: " + file);
00050     _line = 0;
00051     return true;
00052 }
00053 
00054 void XYZReader::Close()
00055 {
00056     _fl.close();
00057 }
00058 
00059 bool XYZReader::FirstFrame(Topology &top)
00060 {
00061     _topology = false;
00062     NextFrame(top);
00063     return true;
00064 }
00065 
00066 bool XYZReader::NextFrame(Topology &top)
00067 {
00068     string line;
00069     getline(_fl, line); ++_line;
00070     //cout << "natoms : " << line << endl;
00071     if(!_fl.eof()) {
00072         // read the number of atoms
00073         _natoms = boost::lexical_cast<int>(line);
00074         if(!_topology && _natoms !=top.BeadCount())
00075             std::runtime_error("number of beads in topology and trajectory difffer");
00076 
00077         // the title line
00078         getline(_fl, line); ++_line;
00079         //cout << "title : " << line << endl;
00080 
00081         // read atoms
00082         for(int i=0; i<_natoms; ++i) {
00083             getline(_fl, line); ++_line;
00084             //cout << "coords : " << line << endl;
00085             if(_fl.eof())
00086                 throw std::runtime_error("unexpected end of file in xyz file");
00087 
00088             vector<string> fields;
00089             Tokenizer tok(line, " ");
00090             tok.ToVector(fields);
00091 
00092             if(fields.size() != 4)
00093                 throw std::runtime_error("invalide line " + 
00094                         boost::lexical_cast<string>(_line) +
00095                         " in xyz file\n" + line);
00096 
00097             Bead *b;
00098             if(_topology)
00099                 b = top.CreateBead(1, fields[0]+boost::lexical_cast<string>(i),
00100                         top.GetOrCreateBeadType(fields[0]), 0, 0, 0);
00101             else
00102                 b = top.getBead(i);
00103 
00104             b->setPos(vec(
00105                     boost::lexical_cast<double>(fields[1]),
00106                     boost::lexical_cast<double>(fields[2]),
00107                     boost::lexical_cast<double>(fields[3])
00108                 ));
00109 
00110         }
00111     }
00112     return !_fl.eof();;
00113 }
